title: New: Boniface – Phantom Limbs
body:
I’m a sucker for over-the-top stadium leaning-pop done right; we’re talking Sam’s Town era The Killers here, and Morning Runner – hey remember them?

Winnipeg’s **Boniface** already showed on his debut single, _I Will Not Return As A Tourist_, that he has a knack for finding those unashamedly brilliant hooks, and his follow-up, _Phantom Limbs_ is undoubtedly just that, brilliant, sure to inspire the sort of air punching that Springsteen dreams of.

Check it out below.

_And don’t come running to the city when I fall / Cause I’m nothing if there’s nothing here at all_
